website_summaries.verdict: Awesome image quality and built-in WiFi make this model a top choice and worth the high price tag.
pros: Has WiFi so you can transfer photos wirelessly
User-friendly technology allows you to adjust photos with ease
cons: Price falls on the higher end of the scale

customer_reviews.title: Warning: Aura app requires read/write access to your photo library
customer_reviews.text: I can’t comment on the quality or ease of use of this frame because I never got that far. We unboxed, downloaded the Aura app, and were excited to get started loading photos for my parents. But the Aura app required read and write access to all photos in my phone’s photo library before I could take the next step. I tried and tried to say “no” and continue, but there was no way around it. And there’s no way I’m allowing some unknown party that kind of access to my photo library. So, if you’re concerned about the privacy and integrity of your visual images, this is not the frame for you. Back it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Share private family photos across the world with ease.
customer_reviews.text: We live and France and have a Nana in Florida & want to keep her updated on the grandkids daily lives. We started by trying to keep a private FB page but keeping images uploaded became a chore. What started out as daily posts turned into quarterly at best. This makes it easy to restart the daily post and let Nana see pic's she'd never otherwise see. We love it, she loves it and have decided Mami & Papi and Tati Diane are getting one too. So simple to use and keep Nana's finger on the pulse of her grandkids lives..
customer_reviews.author: AML

customer_reviews.title: Best Digital Frame by Far!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic digital frame. The quality of the pictures are phenomenal-bright, colorful, crisp, clear! It is energy saving as it goes off with room lighting/motion going off, then back on with lighting/motion. The ease in setting this up and using it is a snap-user-friendly for sure. Anyone can do it! The frame itself is extremely esthetically pleasing... Very pretty and goes well with a variety of decor. Thousands of pics with no storage or cloud fees! What's not to love!
customer_reviews.author: DStarnes

customer_reviews.title: Great family gift that’s a breeze to use!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic frame with high resolution photos at your fingertips! I am a destination shopper and have found myself shopping online more and more. I rarely buy for myself, but when I came across this digital picture frame, I couldn’t help myself. The days of photo books and printing photos are over, however, I have always loved to accessorize my home with family photos. The Aura frame is easy to use and never runs out of space. My family can even share pictures! This keeps us all up to date on the latest accomplishments, adventures and special moments in each other’s lives. I cannot recommend this product enough! A++
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Makes for a happy day!
customer_reviews.text: The Aura Frame is so much fun. Whenever I walk bye I see an old memory appear and brings a smile to my face. My family sends me pictures too, some of which I had never seen. The frame itself is very nice and fits in with any decor. This will be on my list to give as holiday gifts to friends who do not have one already.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great gift! High resolution frame with great color display
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for mom since she loves sharing family photos. She's had a few digital frames in the past with disappointing display quality - this has blown them out of the water. It was a bit more expensive, but the color reproduction + brightness is worth it. App was easy to use. Even my mom figured out how to use it in a few minutes. 10/10 gift idea for families or loved ones! Pros: - Vivid photos - Easy to sync - Frame is high quality - Can update frame with new photos from anywhere in the world Cons: - Bezels are a little thick
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Difficult or impossible to configure
customer_reviews.text: Says that it is easy to setup and give as a gift...spent months trying to configure and was never successful. Tried to give as a gift, only to find out later that the only way to make it work is to have the iPhone app, AND be in the same room. So, if the person you want to give it to doesn't have an iPhone, the app, and the skills to set it up, it is useless. Tried to both contact support and post reviews, but Aura kept TAKING THEM DOWN.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Helsley

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for Grandparents!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the Aura. I have it in the kitchen/dining area as it's the place that I am in and out of most often. There's always a cute photo for me to look at and remember fun times. We are first time grandparents and our son and daughter in law gifted us with the Aura for Christmas. They can send photos through the Aura App and I can also upload photos using the Aura App on my phone. Our daughter is also connected so I am often getting lovely photos to look at from all around California and the world. It's simple to use and a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Kieran Oconnor

customer_reviews.title: Treat yourself- it’s an awesome frame
customer_reviews.text: This is my second digital photo frame, a decade since the first. AMAZING Of course the generational differences would be a given, but Aura has great software packed into flawless hardware. This isn’t a cheap device you’d pick up at Walmart- it’s very sturdy/heavy and has an Apple like packaging feel. As for loading photos, it’s no different than texting. Select your photos, click done, and they are on their way to the frame. The auto dimming and motion detection is on point. My only complaint is the proprietary cord connection. If you have four legged chewers in your family, be-warned. Sigh- suppose a usb-c connection would have been too much
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: I love how easy it is.
customer_reviews.text: Just use the app. When it's connected to wifi, anyone can push a picture to the frame. Let grandma put the pictures she took of the grandkids at the holiday feast this year. Invite anyone to add photos to your frame once you connect it to wifi. Your parents, your kids can all “like” your photos as they do on Facebook. I also like how sturdy this frame is. Best of all, it looks great. I didn't like the looks of most of the digital frames out there until I found the Aura digital picture frame. Self-standing too. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Loyd

customer_reviews.title: Best digital frame on the market!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mom for Christmas. She was able to set up easily and we can share photos from frame to frame. This is a wonderful gift for anymore- particularly the elderly who like to see pictures of family... you can share with them new pics to their frame at anytime. It’s super simple!
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie Bentley

customer_reviews.title: Works beautifully!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the ease of using it. I have set on automatic and 15 sec interval of changing pictures..The frame starts at day light and shuts off when room is dark which is great as I never forget to turn it off at night or on in the morning! Had gotten one as a gift and purchased 3 more. Gave two to family members and I kept one so I have two..one for each .specific family to share pictures with. You can share with multlple people on one frame ( as long as they also have one) but I wished to run it constantly , dedicated to one specific family..Works great! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mzz

customer_reviews.title: Nana loves it!
customer_reviews.text: The best feature of this digital picture frame is the ability to easily share unlimited photo storage to family members to upload their photos for a loved one to view. We all live in different places and the Aura app let us share our moments with Nana event though she cannot always be there. The ability to use the app while talking with Nana on the phone to show her a picture or pictures is a bonus. We also like how the frame is shaped so it will sit nicely on a table so Nana can pick the frame up easily without taking it off the wall.
customer_reviews.author: eroomjt

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding customer service
customer_reviews.text: After a catastrophic fire which destroyed our home, we reached out to Aura to replace the 4 frames we had. They were so kind and patient in working with us to replace the frames and set up the new ones. Their customer service is wonderful. I highly recommend the company and the product to everyone! And by the way, the frames are great--easy to set up, use, and enjoy. We love them.
customer_reviews.author: Brian and Sam

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this frame!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just moved into my new apartment and I was looking for a high quality electronic frame. This product did not disappoint. I was stunned with how good my pictures look. It was really easy to set up and the app is simple to use. The price was well worth the quality of the frame and there is no subscription fee like many other higher quality frames. I know this product is on my friends and family christmas list this year which will make the experience of owning the frame that much better!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin lezette

customer_reviews.title: Best gift I've ever given. Worth every penny. Easy-to-use
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can add photos from my phone through their app to the cloud and they magically appear on my dad's frame. This was the perfect gift. And also you can invite other people to download the app and they can add photos as well.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, quality digital frame
customer_reviews.text: I bought this frame as a gift for my mother. I like that I can grant access to other family members who can also upload pictures onto the frame. It was easy to log onto and to transfer the photos from my cell phone onto the frame. I struggled at first with setting it up at my parents' home because of the change in internet service, but was able to sign it in to their internet and upload pictures I had just taken there. My parents both loved the quality of the pictures and the number of pictures that it can hold. I will see how easy it is to get other family members to upload pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne FTop Contributor: Scuba Diving

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I thought by the reviews this was going to be great. I have an older frame by a different company that u input sd cards into just old school to add or remove pictures. This frame seems so simple but -ugh! Disappointing. I upload pictures from my photos on my phone fine but to pull them from google is a different story . Having to toggle between google and the is app ..an app that I can’t even ask it to shuffle my slideshow-the slideshow is set by the order of pictures in an upload...toooooo much money for such little performance.
customer_reviews.author: Voice

customer_reviews.title: Best gift of the DECADE
customer_reviews.text: This has created a great family habit as we are all spread out. My parents love the surprise of new photos showing up. Probably one of the best gifts this decade. I picked this frame because it looks real, rather than plastic, has some heft to it, and is set up for multiple people to add images remotely, you just download the app and invite people. A really nice feature is that you can recieve the frame and set it up in “gift mode” which means that when they open it up, it will be preconfigured and ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Attractive frame but can’t change order of pictures
customer_reviews.text: Overall very happy with this. PROS more attractive frame than the competition, relatively easy for my 79 year old mom to upload her photos through their app, can set the slideshow to different time intervals, can set slideshow start time and end time (we play it from 6-10pm) CON you can’t rearrange the order of the photos once uploaded. The order they show up in is the order you added them to the slideshow.
customer_reviews.author: architecture student

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Gift, Quick Easy Setup
customer_reviews.text: Really so Happy my siblings and I got this for our mum. Who lives 1500 miles away from us and is isolated right now. We have had so much fun uploading photos to her frame. I only wish there was a speaker so I could send her messages as well. This was an easy set up. Pix look great on it. App is easy and saves info so you don’t add same pix. She loves it and spends time daily watching this. She is getting a glimpse into our lives when she can’t be close right now. Thanks Aura
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Be aware of set up limitations if recipient has no smartphone.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the concept and thought it would be a great way to stream photos to my 90 year old Mom without her owning a smart phone. Alas, though there is a remote set up that can be done to deal with this issue, it is cumbersome and, according to Aura’s instruction, has no guarantee of working. I decided to return the device.
customer_reviews.author: forever young

customer_reviews.title: A really great way to enjoy photos!
customer_reviews.text: So nice to see photos that would usually be tucked in my phone or an album for years! My son and his family have one and we share across both. New pictures of my grandkids show up all the time! Nice size, pictures are sharp. It’s going to be my new wedding/baby gift.
customer_reviews.author: bettenewar

customer_reviews.title: Family Loves it
customer_reviews.text: I have this 5 stars- I bought a different, bigger frame for my husband in February - we still love it. Our daughters page through the photos and make fun of us or themselves. So I bought one for my mother and brother for Mother’s Day.. They are still talking about it.. this is the best thing, gift and brings family together - we share photos and steal photos from each other. I am planning on getting another one for another room... the best! Thank you- only wish now the app would go to televisions .
customer_reviews.author: Lolly M.

customer_reviews.title: Digital photos
customer_reviews.text: I gave him to DIL as a gift. She is in love with it. Very easy for a novice to figure out how to DL the photos to it. Photos are clear.
customer_reviews.author: ANNE

customer_reviews.title: Great for people who can’t be around each other!
customer_reviews.text: love the weight and quality of this product, and especially the ability for other persons to remotely send pictures. Great for these times when people can’t be around each other. I have bought three. I kept one, and gave two to grandparents who live far from me. Unfortunately, even though in my opinion these are very easy to set up, this was beyond difficult for the senior citizens. So I would suggest somehow making this even easier....
customer_reviews.author: M.K.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: One week in use.. First time buying this brand.. easy to set up the app is a great way to send the pictures.. the only reason I’m giving 4 instead of five stars is because 15 seconds is the shortest time of display for each photo and I wish there was a “select all” feature on app when adding pictures.. I had to click on each pic which took a while..i had a Frameo that lasted less than 2 yrs.. if this frame doesn’t work out I will be sure to post another review because it was costly
customer_reviews.author: donna f.

customer_reviews.title: Does not work correctly all the time
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my mom, she loves seeing the photos but for the price it should work way better!
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for the hard to buy for
customer_reviews.text: If you have someone that is difficult to buy do, look no further. The Aura frame is a gift that will be cherished for years to come. The ease of adding pictures makes it perfect for people of all ages. I also love that with the app you can also view the photos others have shared to the frame. My parents still rave about receiving the Aura frame.
customer_reviews.author: Amanning

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful HD colors
customer_reviews.text: Love that you can control on and off times. Nice stone frame in my rustic living room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Solution for Far Away Family
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for grandparents that are missing the kiddos in quarantine. And it’s an absolute smash hit! Picture quality on the frame is fantastic. Bright screen, clear resolution. You can set it up before gifting so all the recipient has to do is plug it in. Easy set-up for both the frame and the app. App allows you to invite people with a text link, once they’ve downloaded the app, it connects right in so they can start uploading pictures. My wife & her sister had at least 100 pics uploaded within minutes. 10/10 would (and will) buy again. This company is quickly going to part me of at least $1000
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: 5* Review 360'
customer_reviews.text: This is the best option that we could find for our family. We have adult children and they can send photos to the frame from where they reside. The app is easy to use, the frame is easy to set up, it would be a superb gift for anyone on your list. One might think why spend this amount on a digital frame,..let me tell you it's worth it once you compare to other digital frames. Quality, usability, and pure enjoyment from this Mama.
customer_reviews.author: Tristesse McLeod

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for in-laws!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this after much research for my in-laws. Setup was fairly easy, with the best feature (for our family) being the ability for numerous family members to upload pictures to it. In-laws took this to FL for the winter and were able to get it working there, and the whole family drops in pictures here and there. Great gift! Expensive, so it really was a gift item, and seems a bit unnecessarily expensive BUT the value seems good, setup was doable, and we're happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi J. Weesies

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this frame my friend recommended. Definitely way better quality than any of the other ones I’ve seen, and really makes photos look like art.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Great experience
customer_reviews.text: The Aura high quality display and good app that allow me to feed pictures to a frame in my parents house. They enjoy getting new pictures. This makes it so much easier for me.
customer_reviews.author: Adam B.

customer_reviews.title: No customer service with Aura Framed
customer_reviews.text: Great product but Absolutely no customer service with Aura frames . I am experiencing some technical issue and trying to get a customer service representative to call me . I have emailed the company and email several times but no one has called to assist me . No customer at all .
customer_reviews.author: Mary V. Rice

customer_reviews.title: Truly, the most optimal way to display digital photos.
customer_reviews.text: I received my Aura digital picture frame a couple of weeks ago and it's already one of my favorite items at home. Set up was simple and intuitive, and I was impressed with its overall ease of use. Although it's technologically advanced, it also looks very elegant and fits beautifully in my living room. I've even purchased a few more to give out as presents during the holiday season. This is seriously just an amazing product all-around!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: After reading many reviews, I decided to go with this Aura frame. Everything about it is terrific, superb quality, easy set up, and a very intuitive app to add pictures and have family and friends join. A great product that you will enjoy. Very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE MINE! My husband gave this for my 30th birthday and the picture quality is amazing. The size is perfect and the frame looks so nice with our other home decor. The app makes it so easy to send photos immediately and within seconds to the frame. Awesome
customer_reviews.author: vmarie

customer_reviews.title: Connection Problems / No SD
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work / no sd slot. Got stuck on wifi/blue tooth connect. I have a router that is 5 ghz and 2.4 ghz but it never was able to get past. This product doesn't meet modern router outputs. It will not continue to meet your router outputs going forward. Ensure you get one that is 5ghz compatible.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING Product
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect gift to our 91 yr old grandparents. Their children, grandchildren and great grandchildren across the US have been able to upload pictures in real time. Our grandparents were in tears upon receiving this gift. It is very classy looking, easy to set up and easy to navigate. This is an amazing product and will be purchased again in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Daneen Landis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome photo frame
customer_reviews.text: This digital photo frame is awesome! Very easy to use. Download the Aura app & instantly add or take away photos. And the photos look great. I returned another photo frame because the pictures were distorted to fit the frame. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: VT

customer_reviews.title: Aura customer support did not help
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this product to work so badly. I specifically asked for this as my mothers day gift. I emailed and called customer support at Aura many times without getting the issue resolved. The frame would not load all of my photos. I tried multiple times over the course of 2 weeks trying to get this to work and it would not.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian W.

customer_reviews.title: Staying Connected
customer_reviews.text: Our family is able to keep my 93 yr. old Mom up to date with what's happening in their lives! She loves sitting in front of the frame and enjoy watching her grandkids and great grandkids grow up. She is in an assisted living facility so now during Covid we can not visit her. The Aura frame has been a wonderful way for us to all stay connected.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Taylor

customer_reviews.title: design functionality and ultimately the photo!
customer_reviews.text: The Aura Mason frames is an aesthetically thoughtful piece of design. The frame feels substantial in weight and rich to the touch. All that aside, the frame is also an incredible picture display and is super easy to use. I am say this as a ludite with an aversion to all things techie. I am saying this as someone who’s planning to buy another Aura Mason frame for my 86 yr old mother who recently discovered wonders of a phone camera. This smart frame is worth every cent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and use for all the people you invite, brings the family together over and over!!!
customer_reviews.text: The frame is fabulous!! We gifted it to my mom for Mother's Day and she is loving it!! So simple to set up and invite your loved ones, even easier to use daily. I have 5 brothers and sisters with 15 grandchildren total for my mom. It has been so easy for us to all upload photos directly to her frame as we take them and she loves that everyday she has new photos to see. She is a huge collector of photos, so this really is exciting for her. She can also easily download and transfer any of our photos to her own storage devices as well. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kate D

customer_reviews.title: Buy this - great gift
customer_reviews.text: My MIL loves it because, duh, endless grandkid picture! I love it because as someone who hates setting up tech, it was easy! My BIL tech lover thinks the image quality is great and stands watching it bc he’s so amazed.
customer_reviews.author: vtreader

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift in the time of Covid19
customer_reviews.text: Great gift idea for grandparents who can’t be with grandkids and family during the Covid19 crisis. Very easy setup for gifting so the frame arrives with photos already loaded and a message. The app is intuitive and easy for multiple family members to add and change photos. Highly recommend! NOTE: Order directly through the Aura website if you’re planning on mailing it, as Amazon doesn’t allow you to do the gift set up remotely.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: Upgrading my picture game.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, from actual frame to packaging. Nothing shakes inside. I would gift this frame to friends and family. Fast load up. Easy instructions. And any questions I had are easily obtained from their self help tabs or contacting direct.
customer_reviews.author: Joray

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and great quality pictures
customer_reviews.text: I like it that’s not too big it’s not too small seems to be a good size, so far it’s a good product. My wife says it’s super easy to use. No SD card needed. So instead of sitting at your computer loading photos to an SD card you just use your Wi-Fi and add the pictures to your frame from your phone or iPad. You can delete or add any with one step.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Very cool gift
customer_reviews.text: This frame is very easy to use and opens up a world of sharing, just be careful who you let post pictures to it. We went from a few to a few hundred very quickly!
customer_reviews.author: emzacsco

customer_reviews.title: Best gift to give or receive!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased our first Aura frame as a gift to my mom, who moved to Floida. This way we could easily send pictures from our phone, to her frame, in another State in seconds. It was a gift, so we already had over 400 pictures on her frame when she opened it. She loved it so much, we purchased 6 additional Aura frames to keep all of our family connected; my hubby's family as well. This frame is easy to use and makes a great gift. We love them!
customer_reviews.author: Jody clutter

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted a month!!
customer_reviews.text: After our internet went out for a day my frame will not come back on! I have emailed them twice and left a voicemail because no one is answering the phones!! No response in 2 weeks!! I only had it for about a month! Loved it when I got it but now all I want is my $$$$ back!!
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: We Love It!
customer_reviews.text: WONDERFUL! My daughters picked this out for a gift and it is great. I am sad that it shipped in original box and was not in a amazon box as it was a gift delivered to the house where the receiver was and received the item. Actually really annoyed that this happened! But product in itself is amazing!! Great idea and it sits on out counter and shuffles.
customer_reviews.author: Krysten B

customer_reviews.title: Quality worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned that there was going to be no noticeable difference between this and cheaper photo frames when a friend recommended an Aura, but the construction is high quality, the frame body has a nice weight to it and the back lighting is really nice. Easy to use app puts pics up from anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Bronte

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and use.
customer_reviews.text: Ease of set up and use. Especially like ability for others to have access to view and add pictures. Awesome device, whole family has them.
customer_reviews.author: W. Vlasak

customer_reviews.title: Best gift I"ve ever given!
customer_reviews.text: My parents absolutely loved this gift! I don't ever think I've given a gift that keeps on giving like this frame. I gave it as a Christmas gift, and my mom is still commenting months later about how much they love it. Super easy to send photos from your phone right to the frame. A home run!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Marie Yatchenko

customer_reviews.title: Best gift ever
customer_reviews.text: During this time of social distances it is wonderful for family to be able to directly send photos to your frame. Really brightens the day. And so easy to use. Best Mother’s Day gift yet!
customer_reviews.author: penny wagher

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and sync to my WiFi. All my family has sent photos to the frame from their iPhone's with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use App. Viabrant display.
customer_reviews.text: The Aura App on Android and iOS is very easy to use even with multiple Aura frames under your account. And the display vibrance and quality of the screen is surprisingly good. I have bought two for gifts so far and they loved them, would buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Bridges

customer_reviews.title: Best gift for mom
customer_reviews.text: My sisters and I bought this for our mother. Within 5 minutes of sending the link to everyone pictures started showing up on the frame immediately. My mother loves this and she gets new pictures all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea for grandparents!
customer_reviews.text: We gifted these frames to my parents to be able to easily share photos of our kids. It was a big hit! We live in a different country so I expected a little bit of a lag, but I was amazed how immediate the photos show up on their end.
customer_reviews.author: Chie Saito

customer_reviews.title: Give this to the ones you love!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and add photos to a family member’s frame in real time. Sharing more intimate moments that I would not display on social media.
customer_reviews.author: Woman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: So easy to set up. This frame sits where I can see the pictures all of the time. I have friends and family around me all day long. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Value technology
customer_reviews.text: Not the least expensive in comparison to what is out their but definitely a value. Works great and has brought slot of joy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Mother's Day gift
customer_reviews.text: We gave one to our mother and preloaded hundreds of pictures from our phones. We set her up, gave a lesson on it, and she is thrilled. It is so simple to add pictures remotely too. Not the least expensive gift, but one that will last for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: JBS

customer_reviews.title: Trouble connecting
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a gift and my MIL cannot hook it up to the WiFi. It’s unfortunate because it seems like the best gift during this quarantine time and family isn’t around as much.
customer_reviews.author: LCapp

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is a great picture frame! Photos are so easy to upload from my phone anywhere anytime.
customer_reviews.author: Lucnor

customer_reviews.title: Love this frame!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing frame. Looks great and so easy to use. We now want one for all of our family members. It really does make sharing and displaying photos easy. Love the idea that we can upload new photos to share with grandparents whenever we like, and so exciting for them when new photos appear. Very happy with this frame, and will definetly getting more.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa J Szarkowski

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a non tech savvy family!
customer_reviews.text: My mom travels with her frame! It is her favorite thing and has really helped the family stay connected - we live all over the country (US). Such high quality images and easy to use interface, not everyone uses the link but it’s so easy for my mom to upload from messages and she likes that she can pick and choose which to display. Perfect for a non tech savvy family. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Faile

customer_reviews.title: Birthday/Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I’ve bought one for each family member so we can share pictures with a click of a button on the app.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I have two Aura frames. I love them - so easy to use and picture quality is great! Love watching my memories daily!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Fields

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: The best digital photo frame out there. Don't even consider another brand. This frame may cost a little more, but worth the $$ for the quality. App is very easy to use. Great gift for grandparents or long distance relatives.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Daily pictures from the other side of the country
customer_reviews.text: Great gift received one from my daughter and son in law to show me pics of our new grandson. They sent me pictures almost daily and it’s a great way to keep up with my grandson
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our grandparents!!! They said it was the best gift they have ever gotten!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Incredible!
customer_reviews.text: This frame was the best gift for the Grandparents!! It is easy enough for them to set up and easy for us to surprise them each day with more beautiful pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Marilu Metherell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use; good deal for the money
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to set up and we love the picture quality. Family members found it simple to upload their pictures. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: maryellen stahley-brown

customer_reviews.title: Birthday Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom, she’s got 3 grandkids and always has new photos that she wants to showcase. So this is great since she can just upload them from her phone.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Lazzerini

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids can upload pictures, so my mother gets to see new pics all the time.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: We love it
customer_reviews.text: It’s awesome. Don’t know what to add to this interview.
customer_reviews.author: GERRY SHUBERT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tech challenged people
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful way for special needs sister to have photos she always has access to and cannot destroy.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Porter

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable everyday
customer_reviews.text: Fun to use and great to watch. Love the spontaneity of the photos
customer_reviews.author: Ellr

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Grown grandkids gave to Grandma for Christmas! Hooked it up at her house all grandkids got passwords and now can easily add pictures from all across the US! Grandma loves it and loves that it goes dark at night!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fragile
customer_reviews.text: It is fragile. Our got knocked over and now doesn't work. It doesn't appear to be any way to fix it. Only replace at another $180 dollars?????
customer_reviews.author: James Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this frame. It looks beautiful in the room and the pictures are super clear. A little challenging to get pictures on the frame (compared to our previous frame) but overall we are super happy!
customer_reviews.author: Reuven Weiser

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this frame!
customer_reviews.text: The frame is easy to use, the application to upload photos is simple, and I love how each picture stays visible long enough to view and enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave it as a gift to my mother in law so she could have pictures of her grandchildren. I can update the photos remotely without her having to do anything!
customer_reviews.author: Brody

customer_reviews.title: Would buy this again.
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to use, the image quality is great, the frame is stable and the auto turn on and off feature is nice. This will be a gift. Would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda S. Rone

customer_reviews.title: Follow the directions and you can go wrong
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use! It connected instantly to WiFi and soooooo easy to add photos and invite others with the link. A great quality gift!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing digital frame
customer_reviews.text: Great gift if you want to feel connected to loved ones who live far away. Easy to setup and add photos. Quality frame with exceptional picture clarity. Bought it for my parents who live five hours away and they absolutely loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Reed$&

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup. Works great although it’s only been in use since Christmas. The only slightly negative remark I have is that it is a bit smaller than I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: T and K Woodworks

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: We gave this frame to our parents for Christmas and they have it running every day! All their grandchildren are on their account and have sent many pictures of their children, our parents' great grandchildren! Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Rosene M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and can do it from another location!
customer_reviews.text: Received this fab gift from my son and daughter in law . Loved it so much purchased another for my 93yeae old mom’s birthday. Once we set it up and invited family members she was able to plug it in for hours of entertainment.
customer_reviews.author: GAYLE LEWKOW

customer_reviews.title: Pictures looks beautiful!!!
customer_reviews.text: The frame is very nice quality. Very sturdy, but still looks nice and fits in with other decor. The photos show up bright, clear and very detailed. The app is a breeze to use. It’s simple to invite people to contribute photos. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Berry

customer_reviews.title: Love this digital frame!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this frame for my mom for Mother's Day and have since bought 3 more frames as gifts! Easy to set up, easy to use and send photos to from your phone, and it's decorative and looks great on our fireplace mantle!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The frame looks great and was easy to set up for my mother in law. she doesn't do a thing, just gets pleasantly surprised by new pictures we upload to her frame from our phones. Still havent figured out how to upload videos though...
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL FISCHETTE

customer_reviews.title: Grandparents love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandparents in Greece. They know nothing about technology. I set this up in their home and update all the time. To hear their voices over the phone with the new pictures makes this the best thing I have ever bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Dino Panopoulos

customer_reviews.title: Remote access
customer_reviews.text: With this device, we have the ability to upload a photo from anywhere to Mom's Aura frame. This feature has been a godsend during the pandemic, as we cannot go visit her in the assisted living facility where she resides.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift- but wish I also got one for me!
customer_reviews.text: Though it is pricey, we gifted it to my parents and it has been their favourite thing to watch while at home. They get to see up to date photos of their grandkids and love the surprise of new ones being added randomly! So easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Megan T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift Idea
customer_reviews.text: Great as a gift! Gives the giver the ability to control pictures on the recipients frame! Great for gifting to those who are not technologically savvy.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

product_meta.title: Aura Mason Smart Digital Picture Frame 9 Inch Free Unlimited Storage HD WiFi Frame The Best Way to Share Photos Feel Together from Away
product_meta.description: Color:GraphiteFeatured on the Oprah's Favorite Things List Aura lets you capture moments and memories and instantly share them with family and friends through the Aura app and any WiFi-enabled Aura Digital Photo Frame It’s the fastest and easiest way to stay connected with your nearest and dearest and there’s no limit to the number of photos you can send or the number of people in your Aura network you can send photos to The Mason Aura Digital Photo Frame has the look and feel of carved stone and brings grounded elegance to any home decor Inside this thoughtfully designed and beautifully crafted frame is advanced technology that ensures your images are always displayed clearly and at their very best Both the App and digital picture frame have a user-friendly interface so everyone can enjoy it Looking for the perfect gift? Whether it’s for a wedding anniversary or birthday give the Mason digital frame preloaded with meaningful photos for any special occasion Sharing photos with family has never been so easy and never looked this good
feature_bullets: THE MOST ADVANCED DIGITAL PICTURE FRAME Share memories with the ones who matter most! Instantly and easily send photos from your Aura App to any digital photo frame in your Aura network User-friendly and iOS/Android phone and tablet-compatible Alexa which allows anyone in your family to share photos via WiFi

ENHANCE YOUR DÉCOR Aura leads in digital frame design with premium materials exquisite craftsmanship and elegant styles that suit any home UNLIMITED DIGITAL PHOTO STORAGE Send 100 000+ photos from your phone to any digital picture frame in your Aura network with unlimited cloud storage at zero additional cost Forever
SEE EVERY DETAIL The Mason digital photo frame automatically displays your photos at the perfect brightness for the room you're in and the frame will go dark when the room does

UNPARALLELED IMAGE QUALITY Eye-catching FHD resolution is the highest in the industry and ensures your digital photos display in true color Rotate for vertical or horizontal orientation For optimal display quality automatically crops and positions photos to fit the digital frame
